DOC.brief_summary: It is hypothesized that a progressive simulated learning strategy will result in better global clinical performance (e.g., technical, communication) and transfer of endoscopic skill, as compared with a high-fidelity simulation strategy.
DOC.brief_title: Colonoscopic Skill Acquisition and Transfer Via Simulated Curriculum of Progressive Training
DOC.criteria: novice endoscopists from Adult Gastroenterology, Pediatric Gastroenterology, General Surgery training programs at University of Toronto Trainees who have performed greater than 25 colonoscopies will be excluded to ensure all participants are novices.
